scripts.pretest: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.preversion: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run doc && npm run build
scripts.pack: npm test && mkdir -p web && browserify -r ./index.js:modl-interpreter >web/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.js && cp web/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.js web/${npm_package_name}-latest.js
scripts.publish: npm test && mkdir -p web && browserify -r ./index.js:modl-interpreter >web/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.js && cp web/${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.js web/${npm_package_name}-latest.js && git tag v${npm_package_version} && git push && git push --tags
